  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="4564" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="4564" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.18</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="568">568</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="89"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Castile</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. <b>Castile</b> was launched in 1998. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Orange Blossom and Petitgrain; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Bergamot and Rose; base notes are Musk and Woodsy Notes. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a                              <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">5</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Soapiness can be overwhelming or too plain
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    Alkaline edge may not appeal to everyone

<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/10555/news.10555-120x120.jpg" alt="Dear Fragrantica: Should I Wear Fragrance to the Office?" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Dear-Fragrantica-Should-I-Wear-Fragrance-to-the-Office-10555.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Dear Fragrantica: Should I Wear Fragrance to the Office?</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Vosnaki</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            02/20/18 11:07
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">88</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="4564"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.14</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="4564"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.38</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2365380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365380" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="austinfranklin513"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="austinfranklin513" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177457">austinfranklin513</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732924142" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Adding this to my growing collection of soapy scents that I love. I own about 17 fragrances and  I have CDG Marseille, LV Imagination, Duas Original scent clean laundry, Amouage Reflection man, Dyptique Orpheon,  Byredo Baldafrique as well as YSL MYSLF le parfum. I have also tried over 20 samples of clean fragrances that i ended up not buying full bottles including the popular ones from maison margiela, byredo , Initio musk therapy, and xerjoff 40 knots etc. so I would consider myself clean fragrance aficionado.<br />
<br />
 This one has the same type of vibe as imagination. This is not to say that they smell the same, but its more that if you like imagination you would enjoy this.  I am not someone who likes very aldehydic type scents like MFK's 724 so if that is what you are into, this is probably not for you. this is a very white floral citrusy scent.<br />
<br />
In terms of longevity and projection, I cant speak for the longevity as i just received it about 30 minutes ago and havent had time to test it out, but I will say the projection is very strong; especially for an edt. I sprayed this once on my arm and my mom could smell it sitting about 4 feet away from me. I cant even imagine how it would project if I sprayed more than once. My guess is this will probably last about 4 hours at the least which is great for an EDT, but it could very well be longer<br />
<br />
I am so beyond happy with this fragrance and it is beyond anything that I imagined. I feel like this is an all year round fragrance and would be totally safe for every day wear.<br />
I ended up getting this one ebay for 180  and considering this is a discontinued frag it was such a good price. It had been on EBay for over a year which is why he gave me such a good price (and it was checked on a frag legit group so i knew it was real as well)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2365380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2365380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266711">sssaaammm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 15:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells its age</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331974" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jajohnso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/844126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.844126.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jajohnso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Smoking-Hot-84413.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84413.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Smoking Hot"title="Smoking Hot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/844126">jajohnso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 18:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had this one for about two years, but hadn't reviewed it because it's so (exquisitely) moderate.<br />
<br />
That said, I keep learning new things from it. Of late, I began considering Castile the standard among my white citrus florals.<br />
<br />
Pure clean, all seasons, day or night; it's a home run.<br />
<br />
Plus, there's this waxy, vivid "bar of soap" note for the aficionados.<br />
<br />
Sometimes, I catch it on some clothes a few days later, double-take, struggling to remember what that wonderful smell is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2331974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2331974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303077" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlohafromHawaii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2274295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlohafromHawaii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2274295">AlohafromHawaii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 21:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have over 50 fragrances and have owned over 100.<br />
<br />
I have to say that because I do not review them all, but this one simply is remarkable.<br />
Clean, soapy, light yet still projects. I had a few different soapy fragrances, but this is the only one that stands apart from the others. It is not offensive, completely unisex, and an absolute compliment puller. <br />
I cannot count how many times people ask me what Im wearing, which which means 1. They can smell it but 2. They want it. (Not me. It). <br />
<br />
If you buy this, you will absolutely not regret it. The fragrances above that they say smell similar? I have smelled many of those and none of them smell like this from a value standpoint where you can pick this up from resellers for anywhere from $100-$150, it is an absolute banger. <br />
 <br />
Sweet. Not too flowery. Creamy. CLEAN. <br />
Not laundry detergent-clean like Byredo Blanche or grandmas hand soap-clean like Exit the King, just gorgeous. <br />
You will reply to my review, thanking me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2303077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2303077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270103" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300296">Roarrkegaard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had no idea I loved soapy fragrances until I came across this one. Castille is such a wonderful, clean, classy fragrance. It's extremely safe and I don't see this one offending anyone. Smells like you got out of the shower using expensive soap. Love for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2270103"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2270103#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2095224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095224" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I prefer this one to Orange Blossom as it is much fresher. Longevity is 1-2 hours on me but as expected for an EDT. <br />
<br />
Loving that although this is a typical citrus white floral it is high quality enough not to smell like a bathroom spray. Beautiful aromatic touch from the petitrain, as expected for Penhaligons. I have tried many neroli perfumes and this is probably the best one on the market. Only wish this was EDP for better performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2095224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2095224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091452" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Owen Bawn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740382.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Owen Bawn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Touch-for-Men-815.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.815.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Touch for Men"title="Touch for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740382">Owen Bawn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 11:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love soap scented fragrances, and I love subtle and discreet fragrances, and Castile hits both objectives. Perfect for work or for casual day wear, I probably go through in excess of a bottle per year. I see no weak point from the first happy spray through the long dry down. It is simply gorgeous. A masterpiece of a fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2091452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2091452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051345" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pilikins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.203182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pilikins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182">Pilikins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have finally got my hands on this! It is pure old fashioned French (or Spanish?) soap. I adore it- fresh, neroli/orange blossom and rose with just a touch of citrus but not too much. Its nothing like NP or 4711. It is less bright and fresh. It is much more like soap suds. It is probably the most authentic soap perfume I have ever come across- including Exit the King and Marseille. It is also charming because it isnt one dimensional- there is an interplay between the different flowers as the perfume progresses. Unisex. Great longevity and sillage. More for summer and spring perhaps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2051345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2051345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043606" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tin Foil Hat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1727912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tin Foil Hat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/Spanish-Leather-Cologne-5009.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5009.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spanish Leather Cologne"title="Spanish Leather Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727912">Tin Foil Hat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A personal staple.<br />
<br />
Soft. The key word here is soft. Smooth, soft, soapy, the orange's acidity is made creamy and floral. This is perfect for spring days and summer evenings, sitting in the garden having freshly showered, with a glass of wine to hand as that heat is tamed by sundown. Great sprayed before bed too.<br />
<br />
Light white florals and high quality neroli give this lashings of smooth and sophisticated soapiness. Like a white linen shirt or fresh bedsheets. Beautiful summer scents of orange, sweet and bitter at the same time.<br />
<br />
Perhaps more suited to 30+ age ranges.<br />
<br />
At the height of the scorching and humid English summer, as short as that period is, I would actually avoid this for something sharper though. GF Trumper's Limes would fit the bill nicely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2043606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2043606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Edonis.d"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1468941"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1468941.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Edonis.d" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1468941">Edonis.d</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 09:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favourite perfume to use after i shower. Its fresh and just very lightly sweet and filled with memories. <br />
Like the name itself, it reminds me of Castile soap but more sophisticated and luxurious . <br />
With less words, this one is clean, double fresh, comfy night at home before bed  or road trip through the Mediterranean countries .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="2038513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=2038513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's unbelievable how there were so many similar votes. Misdirections are made.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1975024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1975024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1974278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1974278" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheJeffSet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1886822.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheJeffSet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Fougere-Royale-2010-10891.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10891.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fougere Royale (2010)"title="Fougere Royale (2010)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1974278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1974278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886822">TheJeffSet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-11">11/11/23 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So classic, fresh and clean. This and Guerlain's Vetiver are my two everyday fragrances.<br />
<br />
To me, this is 100% unisex, and it smells completely masculine or feminine depending on who's wearing it. If a woman walked past you wearing this, you'd think "Wow, she smells beautiful. Like a dewey morning garden." If you smelled this on a man, you'd think "Woof. He smells freshly showered. And expensive."<br />
<br />
Castile is not trendy. Twenty-somethings are not going to be lining up to buy it. This is beautiful, timeless perfumery. Definitely skews more mature, which is exactly what I go for. Some people complain about the price, but if you love something, who cares? I love this, and I'll gladly pay the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1974278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1974278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902144" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GirlOnFire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="GirlOnFire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Byzance-1423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Byzance"title="Byzance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); Its simply wonderful for smelling very clean. I imagine myself frolicking around Sevilla in ungodly heat, smelling of Castile. Its amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1902144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1902144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880318" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragrantMatty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1735761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragrantMatty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735761">FragrantMatty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Enjoyable citrus opening with orange blossom, petitgrain and some musk. Dries down to a soapy scent that makes me think of Ivory bar soap or Irish Spring bar soap. The citrus opening is short, lasting several minutes and the soapy dry down lasts at least 2 hours for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1880318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1880318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866699" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont care how good a perfume or EDT smells. If the longevity is less than 1 hour its problematic. I bought this in Penhaligons summer sale, 100 ml bottle for 71 and have used 5 ml in 5 days. Unisex orange blossom with a green orange and fuzzy pollen which my husband and I love. Citrus perfumes are perfect for the summer!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1866699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1866699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1842153" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SFX1961"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1002208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SFX1961" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/1962-40919.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40919.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1962"title="1962"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1842153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1842153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802313" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pippingreen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1678988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pippingreen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678988">pippingreen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-06">04/06/23 13:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the most amazing smell. It's so warm and comforting but so clean and wearable, it's not really a "perfume-y" smell and not sweet at all. I wish it had a big more projection and lasted a few more hours, if it did, I'd buy a full size so fast.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1802313"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1802313#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1784642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="June_in_May"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1707865"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1707865.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="June_in_May" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/D-G-Anthology-L-Imperatrice-3-6086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="D&G Anthology L'Imperatrice 3"title="D&G Anthology L'Imperatrice 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1707865">June_in_May</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-16">03/16/23 00:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I can only smell woodsy notes like when you smell tree bark or break a branch, but after a while, flower and orange notes start to kick in. Took me some time to get used to the initial note since I considered it fairly intense, but  it was worth the effort because this perfrume is gorgeous. The only problem is that it can be quite faint and doesn't last long. But I can't stand super intense perfurme so I'm okay with how long this one lasts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1784642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1784642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1776508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not terribly original, and while it lasts, it is lovely.  Problem is, it doesn't last.  Citrus initially hits like a bomb, settles down, and then disappears.  Reminiscent of 4711.  Only wish it would last as long.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1776508"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1776508#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1737111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664252">Neverapeoplepleaser</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-18">01/18/23 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a Penhaligons fan. I bought Castile whilst on sale. Oh! It's just glorious. If you want to smell like expensive Castile soap, then buy this. It's soft, comforting, extremely clean smelling. My only gripe is that I wish it was a tad longer lasting because its so gorgeous. But I appreciate that you would then lose the beauty of it, I suppose. Quite expensive for what it is....but I'd buy again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1737111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1737111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="neoaspect"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606323"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1606323.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="neoaspect" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606323">neoaspect</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-30">11/30/22 07:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, soapy and slightly crisp orange blossom to begin with, then warms up on the skin and gets slightly sweeter. There's a little hint of wood in the drydown that I really like - it's not bro-ey or aggressive, just warm, like wood beams on a ceiling or a rocking chair or something.<br />
I don't get much citrus on my skin, although I've only worn it out once, so I might see if that changes.<br />
A bit expensive for what it is, but it's very nice - clean without being sterile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1699138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1699138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1664925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1664925" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Child Chemist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1495263.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Child Chemist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1664925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1664925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495263">Child Chemist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-13">10/13/22 00:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I detect something off about Castille. I experience a "bug spray," or what I initially thought was a "sticker glue" smell. This note persists into the dry drown. I have other soapy and petitgrain scents, but nothing else from this house to compare with. It's a lovely presentation, and I overlook the "glue note" while I'm wearing Castile, but, for me, it drags down the wearing experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1664925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1664925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1622251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
