In the vein of TF Neroli Portofino, 4711, Neroli Canvas, ADP Essenza &amp; maybe even Assoluta, this is indeed a drive in the DB5 on a warm summer day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1622251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1622251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1616963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexhasfragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481699"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1481699.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexhasfragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-Extreme-29675.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29675.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir Extreme"title="Noir Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1616963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1616963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481699">alexhasfragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-04">08/04/22 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I won't say i don't like this, i'll just say it didn't worked on me. The smell itself is pleasant, made me imagine i'm on a tea chat with an aristocrat grandma in her huge backyard garden full of well-kept spring flowers, that's the thing.. i find it more more feminine , the kind of everyday fragrance perfect for a styled mature women who loves flowers. The bottle looks extravagant to me, projects well.. good fragrance but not for me, not for a men, that's my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1616963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1616963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1586164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1586164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Keelhauld"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1518524"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1518524.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Keelhauld" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1586164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1586164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1518524">Keelhauld</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-17">06/17/22 06:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first Penhaligons. The name rings of soapy vibes, and It was the most affordable! Most would describe it as pleasant and I agree. I do one spray on the forearm and it smells nice. After a few hours it becomes a skin scent. I like the natural non patchouli smell. I really enjoy the soapy note of perfumes. Its a nice clean scent and a change from boring citrus scents that dry down to cedar in my collection. It seems like too many fragrances use cedar notes just so they can call it a mens fragrance. Too much cedar and you may as well be running on a hamster wheel instead of a treadmill!  Im really liking this scent. I consider it unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1586164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1586164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578886" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Boo1974"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1465856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Boo1974" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Juniper-Sling-13266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Juniper Sling"title="Juniper Sling"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465856">Boo1974</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-06">06/06/22 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deceptively gorgeous! Super soapy, light, fresh, clean, bright. I smell like I've just stepped out of the shower after having an invigorating scrub with an old fashioned soap. it's not a complex smell but that's ok, not everything needs to be layered and multi-faceted.<br />
<br />
I feel fresh, grown up, immaculate and revitalised, however poor longevity and sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1578886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1578886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1562455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1562455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1562455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-12">05/12/22 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Obviously 'soapy' should be a listed accord in the accord stack on this Fragrantica page. But that happens a lot in Fragrantica. Sometimes 'powdery' is listed when the accord is more soapy, and sometimes not listed at all. That is the case on the soapy Eight and Bob Fragrantica page. But the citrusy opening of Castile dries down into the most elegant Castile soap smell. I've never really smelled Castile soap but if it smells like this I'll be out looking for some. Another elegant Penhaligon offering to go along with my Sartorial and The Tragedy of Lord George. It won't join Sartorial and Lord George in my Barbershop Fougere collection though because Castile is more of a warm weather citrus-soapy freshie, suitable as an office scent but versatile enough for a wide range of wearability scenarios.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1562455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1562455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1553466" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1553466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1553466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-29">04/29/22 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased this blind because I'm a fan of soapy scents and the house of Pengaligon's.<br />
Initially I was a bit disappointed because it strongly reminds me of Neroli Portofino (4711 DNA), which I also love, but already have. <br />
<br />
I am recovering from a cold so I don't think I was judging this clearly because today, I can clearly smell the soapy base of castile and it's wonderful.<br />
Smells like a refined gentleman scent. <br />
<br />
Very natural to my nose and I don't detect aroma chemicals. This perfoms very very well for an EDT. Nice scent bubble for around 4 to 5 hours which is good for this type (natural) scent.<br />
<br />
Scent 8/10<br />
Performance 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1553466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1553466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Baccarat Racquets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Baccarat Racquets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Sillage-64105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Sillage"title="Club de Nuit Sillage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241">Baccarat Racquets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-28">03/28/22 03:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the masculine counterpart to Orange blossom as others have stated the similarities despite them both being unisex in my opinion. This and Orange blossom both contain the best Orange blossom accord I have ever smelled, far and away from Jo Malone and Elizabeth Ardens. This smells so fresh and has that real British traditional cologne feeling to it. Sillage is average however you wouldn't want this scent to be over powering anyway. Last around 4 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1531979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1531979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1510196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1510196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FancyPants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1443896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FancyPants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1510196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1510196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443896">FancyPants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-23">02/23/22 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I smelled this at the Windsor store (no longer there) it was incredible. I bought it after only one sniff.<br />
But, I should've bought a sample and lived with it for a day or two before making a decision.<br />
<br />
It's a lovely scent, I just find that orange blossom a bit too much. Even two sprays is too much in that first hour, catching the back of my throat, but then it disappears after only a couple of hours. An orange blossom firework... big intense explosion, then gone.<br />
<br />
Thanks for reading.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1510196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1510196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509314" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like clean gentleman's traditional  Eau de Cologne. No nonsense, straight to the point, elegantly soapy, potent, long lasting. Not your grandfather's scent - this family is much older than that. Imagine newly invented steam clocks and gas lamps, horse carriages. You have a dinner appointment on business, and you apply this fragrance as you leave your bath. There is no time to waste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1509314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1509314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1465470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1465470" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jackie strength"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1430522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jackie strength" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1465470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1465470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); I think it is no longer produced?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1465470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1465470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1459614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1459614" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frozen_music"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frozen_music" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4564.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Castile"title="Castile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1459614ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1459614" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399896">frozen_music</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-08">12/08/21 05:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thought I disagreed with MaquiLab but after a while they do settle very similarly. I'm wearing Castille on one wrist and Orange Blossom on the other. Castille is much more sophisticated with a lovely warmth to it, I just wish the opening lasted longer and had better projection. Orange Blossom is fresher, strikes me as a younger fragrance. It lacks the depth of Castille.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1459614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1459614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1457203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1457203" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1457203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1457203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); Literally identical.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1457203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1457203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1434821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1434821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jondy90"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1296086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jondy90" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1434821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1434821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1296086">jondy90</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-26">10/26/21 06:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>great classic freshie</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1434821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1434821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1418028" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1418028" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jim_Smith"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1285562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1285562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jim_Smith" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1418028ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1418028" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1285562">Jim_Smith</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-27">09/27/21 13:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this.   To use a clunky analogy, if it was a suit, it would be a lightweight English suit worn on a trip to Spain.   In a similar way,  Aqua Di Parma, or better, would be an Italian suit worn in the South of Italy.  As a native British geezer,  I would feel more natural in the English suit, but at the same time, be full of admiration for Italian dash.  That's not to say it should only be worn dressed up, if at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1418028"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1418028#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1349487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1349487" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alphairone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1213298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alphairone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Claudio-La-Viola/La-Lettera-Da-43914.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43914.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Lettera Da..."title="La Lettera Da..."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1349487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1349487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213298">alphairone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-26">05/26/21 06:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Summer temperatures call for Penhaligon's Castile. It is a clean, vivacious orange blossom kissed with a generous portion of petitgrain and just a touch of rose splendor. It is evocative on sunlight, green leaves, and warm breezes.<br />
<br />
When wearing Castile, it feels winsome on my skin, a real mood elevator. I love when a simple and beautiful fragrance transports the wearer, even if for a short time. Castile does wear on the skin for a reasonable amount of time, but it doesn't persist; it simply isn't built that way. Would you want the taste of a summer cocktail to wear out its welcome on your palate? Of course you want your palate cleared, whether or not you choose to have another... Castile can be applied in the morning and then in the afternoon, that's it. Don't try to squeeze 'beast mode' out of citrus aromatics and sacrifice quality with nagging, jagged aromachems that desperately prolong some idea of citrus that doesn't exist in nature. They will eventually dull your senses like MSG can dull the taste buds. Also, you can spray some on your shirtthe juice is transparent. Go for it.<br />
<br />
Castile's dry down in soapy musk that is nostalgic and brings a smile to my face. What a treat it is to reach for this in my summer scent arsenal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1349487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1349487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1347975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1347975" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clarag33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324371"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="clarag33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/09-Orange-Star-8670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="09 Orange Star"title="09 Orange Star"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1347975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1347975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324371">clarag33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-23">05/23/21 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful, clean, summery, Spanish holiday definitely unisex in a good way.  Mood uplifted!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1347975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1347975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1294106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1294106" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michelle12345678"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michelle12345678" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Gold-70015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold +"title="Gold +"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1294106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1294106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935">Michelle12345678</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-17">02/17/21 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A pleasant neroli, but has rose underpinnings which is what makes it unique. I prefer other nerolis over this, such as Neroli Portofino by Tom Ford, L'eau de Neroli by Diptyque. But if you like neroli and you like rose, this may be the perfect choice for you. It's beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1294106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1294106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1251664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1251664" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Csent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Csent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4564.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Castile"title="Castile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1251664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1251664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214612">Csent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-22">11/22/20 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really adore this fragrance. Penhaligons can be a bit hit and miss I always find. Initial smell in the store can pull you in and entice you to spend your hard earned money, and then when you get  home performance can be lacking and sillage poor. This can leave you feeling a bit sore having spent a pretty penny on something that might only smell great for an hour.<br />
<br />
With Castile, the usual happened. I first smelt this in a sampler and loved it, it was fresh citrus neroli / bergamot scent but with a depth and more mature side. It is like the charming uncle of Davidoff Cool Water, more mature with a woodsy edge .<br />
<br />
My sampler did not last long and after spending a day or two wearing this I decided I was actually  very pleased with the longevity compared to other pengaligons fragrances I had encountered. With this I decided to actually buy a full bottle wow!<br />
<br />
I am still very happy with this fragrance. It lasts me all day, the sillage is very good and I can still smell it on clothes days later.<br />
It's is fresh, inspiring and a real mood boost. It has a timeless and classic energy and wherever you are , whatever you are doing this fragrance will go down a treat and can't be faulted.<br />
<br />
Although this is intended for the heat and bright summer days, I can still reach for this almost every day for any scenario.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1251664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1251664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1204206" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1204206" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ts4r"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1143921.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ts4r" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Escentric-05-58970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escentric 05"title="Escentric 05"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1204206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1204206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1196589" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kingdom-Scotland/Metamorphic-53987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Metamorphic"title="Metamorphic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1196589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1196589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-06">07/06/20 08:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You know that scene in the 2006 Bond film Casino Royal when Daniel Craig saunters into a hotel sporting a crisp, white linen shirt (the one where the female receptionist melts a little)? I like to imagine hes wearing Castile. The top notes of soapy-clean orange blossom, petit grain and lime with musky/woodsy undertones = elegance in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1196589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1196589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1185286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Even smelling my shirt only has a tiny smell to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1185286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1185286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1116328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1072497" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SlamAffiche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SlamAffiche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1072497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1072497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177125">SlamAffiche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-23">06/23/19 06:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>perhaps one of the best clean soapy scents out there. therefore aptly named castile. the neroli here is creamy and soapy, and perhaps softened some with a hint of rose. very unlike the zingy freshness of neroli portofino.<br />
<br />
its similar and style and performance to colonia essenza by acqua di parma.<br />
<br />
despite it not having any of the masculine fougere notes, it does seem like a barbershop scent to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1072497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1072497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1070664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158756">AnnieT303</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-04">05/04/19 23:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely soapy, which is exactly what I was going for! <br />
 I LOVE this scent - it's such a clean, beautiful (and unisex for sure) soap of a fragrance! <br />
<br />
Very glad, after reading reviews here, that I tested this out via decant - have since reordered and just love this very very clean, soapy, lively bottle of joy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1057216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1057216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1056599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1056599" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bbjr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.199261.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bbjr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1056599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1056599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199261">Bbjr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-03">05/03/19 02:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soapy, musky, perfectly blended. The neroli doesnt scream, thank god, and theres a hint of Rose in the background. This is one of the best Ive tried from Penhaligons. Ive always had issues with longevity from this line but Castile last a good 12 hours on me and for an EDT thats  just fantastic. Well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1056599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1056599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1056370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1056370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellMyCheese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellMyCheese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1056370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1056370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171159">SmellMyCheese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-02">05/02/19 07:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Superb fragrance for the price. Initially I was going to compare this to Neroli Portofino but I think that is slightly misleading as they veer into different directions than you would think just based on citrus and neroli elements which they both share for their main.<br />
<br />
I could also bring in velvet bergamot, adp colonia, xerjoff nio etc etc.<br />
<br />
So I should mention what is different about Castile and why I think it has some uniqueness; Here I feel it is the use of the rose that is blended in a way to give this one a musky aquatic lean as the slightly funky rose mixing with citrus comes out quite seaside like almost sel marin at first but also dances back and forth with the soapiness of the neroli.<br />
The sea like aspect dies as it dries and becomes more of a powdery expensive soap that reminds me a little of Prada Infusion DHomme but with a more citrus aquatic edge.<br />
<br />
It is a touch sharp with its soapiness and I think Neroli Portofino and higher end ones like Nio do beat it there but there isnt too much in it, so in terms of value for this type of scent this gets top marks for me. Very nice one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1056370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1056370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1052294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1052294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tayyabforyouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1124219.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tayyabforyouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Club-31424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Club"title="Colonia Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1052294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1052294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219">tayyabforyouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-18">04/18/19 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A wonderful barbershop neroli scent, this actually smells like Castile soap from Spain. It is a simple combination of orange blossom, petitgrain, musk, and rose, and reminds me a lot of both Acqua di Parma Colonia Essenza and Acqua di Parma Colonia. Longevity is also fantastic, with good projection for over 4 hours. I've smelled most of the Penhaligon's line, and this one was my favourite by far. There isn't really much more to say about it other than that this is one of the best masculine neroli scents out there.<br />
<br />
5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1052294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1052294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1050590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1050590" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/885210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.885210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1804-4486.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4486.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1804"title="1804"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1050590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1050590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/885210">adice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-13">04/13/19 09:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The musc is most prominent on my skin. Reminds me a bit of the musc used in fragrances like Clair de Musc or Skin Musk. Sort of the more masculine version of those types of perfumes. The citrus notes are extremely fleeting on my skin lasting only a few minutes. This type of musc fragrance is just not my cup of tea.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1050590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1050590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1048040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1048040" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pablosmelly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1155873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pablosmelly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Heritage-Eau-de-Parfum-25312.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25312.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heritage Eau de Parfum"title="Heritage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1048040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1048040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155873">pablosmelly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-04">04/04/19 22:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A clean citrus and soapy fragrance. Very nice and relaxing.<br />
<br />
The citrus part lasts maybe an hour and a half on my skin.<br />
<br />
The soapiness part reminds me of the kind of soap that I used to wash my hands with as a kid when I was in school. The only thing that's missing are the brown folded paper towels I dried them off with.<br />
<br />
My wife says it smells cheap. I don't necessarily agree that it smells cheap but...I get what she's saying. It does an excellent job of mimicking that classic soap smell.<br />
<br />
Love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="1048040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=1048040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent996711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Amazing fragrance, masterpiece in citrus and neroli.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="996711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=996711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent994915" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This works very well on both men and women.<br />
<br />
Word of advice: proceed with caution when spraying, as it can be a tad too much, and make you smell like a Gare de Lyon station toilet freshener you can smell when you get straight out of the Eurostar, if you accidentally overspray it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; There are better ones out there imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="932755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=932755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent912211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Slightly veering into that just washed laundry smell, but luckily saved by the bright neroli. Old fashioned, but in a good way. One could become quite addicted to this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4564"comment_id="912211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html?ccid=912211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent909049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
